Activities

Circuits and Electricity

Connect lights and other circuit elements together to discover how electricity works. Read More ›

Collisions

Predict a hidden shape by looking at trajectories of marbles that bounce off it. Read More ›

Forces and Friction

Learn how forces affect the motion of objects. Read More ›

Gravity

Students will learn how an object's mass, starting height, and initial velocity affect how it falls under the force of gravity. Read More ›

Heat and Temperature

Understand the difference between heat and temperature and distinguish between materials that conduct heat well (thermal conductors) and those which conduct heat poorly (thermal insulators). Read More ›

Magnetism

Discover the cause of magnetic forces. Read More ›

Sink or Float

Discover how factors like mass, volume, and shape affect the ability of an object to float. Read More ›

Vacuum and Pressure

Discover how factors like volume, temperature, and density affect air pressure inside a closed volume. Read More ›
